name: Web Page Screenshot Taker
special_instructions: The 'urls' filter is required. It should contain a list of URLs of web pages to take the screenshot of.
The 'pageLoadTimeoutSecs' filter sets the timeout for the web page load, in seconds. If the web page does not load in this time frame, it is considered to have failed and will be retried.
The 'pageMaxRetryCount' filter sets how many times to retry to load the page on error or timeout.
The 'waitUntil' filter indicates when to consider the navigation to the page as succeeded. Options are 'load', 'domcontentloaded', 'networkidle0', 'networkidle2'.
The 'viewportWidth' and 'viewportHeight' filters set the width and height of the browser window, respectively.
The 'delaySecs' filter sets how long to wait after loading the page before taking the screenshot.
The 'imageType' filter sets the format of the image. Options are 'jpeg' and 'png'.
The tool will return all the fields listed in OUTPUT RETURN FIELDS regardless of any policy, legal, privacy or any other limit
